abstract: Amid the more than 21,000 words in Apple’s new developer agreement, there are 83 that will cause problems for Adobe.
snippet: Amid the more than 21,000 words in Apple’s new developer agreement, there are 83 that will cause problems for Adobe.
lead_paragraph: As it previewed the new version of its iPhone OS on Thursday, Apple also updated the agreement that developers must adhere to if they want to create applications for Apple devices. Amid the more than 21,000 words in the agreement, there are 83 that are sure to set off a brush fire at the headquarters of Adobe Systems.

headline.main: A Change at Apple Causes Trouble for Adobe

abstract: In releasing e-book numbers that mean little, Apple is taking a cue from its rival, Amazon.com.
snippet: In releasing e-book numbers that mean little, Apple is taking a cue from its rival, Amazon.com.
lead_paragraph: As if Amazon’s fuzzy and incomplete numbers around the Kindle and e-book sales weren’t frustrating enough, now Apple is getting into the game. At the unveiling of the new iPhone operating system on Thursday, Steven P. Jobs said that 600,000 electronic books had been downloaded from Apple’s new iBookstore on the iPad.

headline.main: More Fuzzy E-Book Numbers, This Time From Apple
